hero.subcopy: Student, young professional, parent, or small business owner? SampattiNaya helps you grasp the basics, plan clearly, and practice through interactive simulations.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about SampattiNaya

faqs.question: What is SampattiNaya?
faqs.answer: SampattiNaya is a financial literacy learning platform that helps you manage your finances better through interactive simulations, quizzes, and practical guides.

faqs.question: Is SampattiNaya free?
faqs.answer: Yes, SampattiNaya can be used for free with basic features. We also provide premium features for a more in-depth learning experience.

faqs.question: Who can use SampattiNaya?
faqs.answer: SampattiNaya is designed for everyone - students, young professionals, parents, and small business owners who want to improve their financial literacy.

faqs.question: How do I start learning on SampattiNaya?
faqs.answer: Simply register for a free account, take an initial assessment test to know your level, then start with learning modules that suit your needs.

faqs.question: Is my data safe on SampattiNaya?
faqs.answer: Yes, your data security is our top priority. We use enterprise-level encryption and never share your personal information with third parties.

faqs.question: How does the leaderboard system work?
faqs.answer: The leaderboard system is based on points you collect from completing quizzes, simulations, and other learning activities. The more actively you learn, the higher your ranking.
